events.comment:
Variables meaning:

moving: Track if the player is moving (if 1 it's moving >> move it in the update code) or not (if 0 it isn't moving >> can read keys to move)
grid_size: Grid size in pixels
dest: The destination position of the player, can be an X or Y position
dir_x: -1 (left), 1 (right)
dir_y: -1 (up), 1 (down)
not moving, check if a key is being pressed, turn off movement
Check direction (+ and - used so if both keys are pressed it won't move) and calculate the destination
There is a real movement direction, set as moving and calculate the destination
Already moving, set position in function of dir_x and dir_y (only one can be non-zero), the speed will be 100 pixels/second
The X direction is non-zero, stop the player if reaches destination
The Y direction is non-zero, stop the player if reaches destination
